label.text_key: Scan the QR code to login to Twitch Integration.
Alternatively you can login to Twitch here: [DECEA3]https://www.twitch.tv/activate[-]

simplebutton.name: btnLoginAccount
simplebutton.caption: Account
simplebutton.tooltip_key: Login with your real Discord account

simplebutton.name: btnLoginProvisional
simplebutton.caption: Provisional
simplebutton.tooltip_key: Login with a provisional Discord account based on your EOS ID
